Translations.Text: kvaph. Gauravanvita kur‌anina ane
avaralle obbanu eccarisuvavanagi avara balige banda kuritu avaru accari paduttiddare. Addarindale dhikkarigalu heluttare; ‘‘idu tira vicitravagide’’
‘‘navu sattu mannada balika (matte jiva padeyuvude)? A punaragamana tira durada sadhyateyagide (asadhyavagide)’’
bhumiyu avarinda (avara mrta sariradinda) enannu kittukondide embudannu navu cennagi ballevu mattu nam'ma bali ellavannu suraksitavagi dakhalisiduva granthavide
nijavagi, satyavu tam'ma balige bandaga avaru adannu tiraskarisiruvaru mattu avaru gondaladalliddare
avarenu, tam'ma meliruva akasadedege, navu adannu hege racisiddeve mattu hege adannu alankarisiddevendu noduvudillave? Adaralli yava kundu korateyu illa
Bhumiyannu navu haradi bittaruvevu mattu navu adaralli parvatagalannu nettiruvevu. Hagu adaralli ella bageya sundara vastugalannu belesiruvevu
ivu (allahanedege) oliyuva pratiyobba dasana kannu teresuva mattu avanige pathavaguva sadhanagalagive
ade riti, navu akasadinda samrd'dha nirannu ilisiruvevu hagu a mulaka totagalannu mattu holagala dhan'yagalannu belesiruvevu
mattu (adarindale), sampanna goncalugaliruva, ettarada kharjurada gidagalannu belesiruvevu
ivella (nam'ma) dasarigagiruva aharagalu. Mattu navu, nirjivavagiruva nadugalige a (nirina) mulaka, maru jiva niduvevu. Higeye nadeyalide sattavarannu (matte jivantagolisi) horategeyuva kriye
avariginta hinde nuhara janangadavaru, ras's‌na nivasigalu mattu samud janangadavaru tiraskarisiddaru
hageye, ad janangadavaru, phir‌aun hagu lut‌ra bandhugalu
aikahdavaru hagu tubba'a janangadavaru – avarellaru devadutarannu tiraskarisiddaru. Avarige nidalagidda (sikseya) munneccarikeyu anusthanavagibittittu
navenu prathama bariya srsti kriyeyinda danidu hogiddeveye? Nijavagi, (matte) hosadagi srstiyaguva kuritu avaru sansayadalliddare
nave manusyanannu srstisiruvevu mattu avana manas'sinolagina gondalagalannu navu cennagi ballevu. Nijavagi navu avana jivanadigintalu avanige hattiravagiruvevu
avana balabhagadallu eda bhagadallu kulitiruva ibbaru barahagararu (avana ella karmagalannu) barediduttare
avanu aduva yava matannu, sada jagrtanagiruva kavalugaranobbanu dakhalisade iruvudilla
konege, nijakku maranada amalu bandubittaga (avanodane), ‘‘ninu anjuttiddudu idanne’’ ennalaguvudu
mattu kahaleyannu udalaguvudu. Aduve, munneccarike nidalagidda dina
Andu pratiyobbanu (allahana munde) hajaraguvanu. Avana jote (avanannu) nadesuva obbaniruvanu mattu obba saksiyu iruvanu
(avanodane helalaguvudu;) ‘‘ninu i (dinada) kuritu niscintanagidde. Idiga navu ninna tereyannu ninninda sarisi bittiruvevu. Ido, indu ninna drsti bahala tiksnavagide’’
avana jotegiruvavanu heluvanu; ‘‘idu nanna bali sid'dhavagiruva, (avana karmagala) dakhale’’
(appaneyaguvudu;) ‘‘nivibbaru, pratiyobba krtaghna, vidrohiyannu narakadolakke esedu bidiri’’
‘‘satkaryakke tadeyodduttidda, atirekavesaguttidda (hagu) sansaya bittuttiddatanannu (narakadolakke eseyiri)’’
‘‘avanu allahana jote itararannu devaragisikondiddanu. Idiga avanannu kathina sikseyolakke (narakakke) esedubidiri’’
avana sangatiyagiddavanu heluvanu; ‘‘nam'modeya, avanannu vidrohiyagisidavanu nanalla. Svatah avane tappu dariyalli bahudura horatu hogiddanu’’
(allahanu) heluvanu; nivu nanna munde jagaladabedi, nimage nanu munneccarikeyannu hindeye kalisikottidde
nanna bali matu badalaguvudilla. Mattu nanu dasara mele akramavesaguvavanalla
andu navu narakadodane, ‘‘ninu tumbideya?’’ Endu keluvevu. Adu ‘‘innastu ideye?’’ Ennuvudu
mattu navu svargavannu nikatagolisuvevu. Adendu (avarinda) duravagadu
idanne vagdana madalagittu; nimage hagu (allahanatta) olavu toruttaliruva mattu sada jagrtanagiruva pratiyobbanige
(hageye) kannare kanadeye, a apara dayamayana bhaktanagiruvavanige mattu pade pade (allahanatta) oliyuva manas'sinondige bandiruvavanige
(avarodane helalaguvudu;) santiyondige idannu pravesisiri. Iduve, sasvata dina
Alli avarige avaru bayasiddellavu sigalide, matravalla, nam'ma bali mattastide
avariginta (makkahdavariginta) hinde navu adesto janangagalannu nasa madiruvevu. Avaru ivariginta tumba adare, konege ‘‘palayanakke dariyunte?’’ Ennutta avaru nadu nadu aleya todagidaru
idaralli khandita pathavide, manas'sullavarige athava kivigottu keluvavaru mattu noduvavarige
akasagalannu hagu bhumiyannu mattu avugala naduve iruva ellavannu navu aru dinagalalli srstisiruvevu mattu nam'mannu yava danivu badhisalilla
avaraduva matugala kuritu nivu sahanasilaragiri. Mattu suryodayakke munnavu suryastamanakke munnavu nim'ma odeyanannu prasansisutta avana pavitravannu japisiri
mattu ratriya veleyallu sastangaveragida balikavu avana pavitravannu japisiri
keliri, kuguvavanu hattiradindale kuguva ondu dina (baralide)
andu avaru nijakku ondu arbhatavannu keluvaru. Aduve
(gorigalinda) horaduva dinavagiruvudu
khandita nave jivanavannu nidutteve mattu nave sayisutteve mattu nam'medege (ellaru) maralabekagide
avara melinda bhumiyu biridu biduva dina avaru (adarolaginda) dhavisuvaru. I jamavaneyu nam'ma mattige sulabhavagide
